Class StatisticalMechanics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.StatisticalMechanics
public class StatisticalMechanics extends Object
Statistical mechanics - bridge between microscopic and macroscopic physics.

Boltzmann distribution, partition functions, entropy from microstates.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StatisticalMechanics()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Real
    averageEnergy(Real partitionFunction, Real temperature, Real dZdT)
    Average energy from partition function: = -∂ln(Z)/∂β where β = 1/kT
    static Real
    boltzmannEntropy(Real numMicrostates)
    Boltzmann entropy: S = k ln(Ω) where Ω is number of microstates
    static Real
    boltzmannProbability(Real energy, Real temperature, Real partitionFunction)
    Boltzmann distribution: P(E) = e^(-E/kT) / Z Returns probability of state with energy E
    static Real
    boseEinsteinDistribution(Real energy, Real chemicalPotential, Real temperature)
    Bose-Einstein distribution: f(E) = 1/(e^((E-μ)/kT) - 1) For bosons (photons, etc.)
    static Real
    fermiDiracDistribution(Real energy, Real chemicalPotential, Real temperature)
    Fermi-Dirac distribution: f(E) = 1/(e^((E-μ)/kT) + 1) For fermions (electrons, etc.)
    static Real
    gibbsFreeEnergy(Real enthalpy, Real temperature, Real entropy)
    Gibbs free energy: G = H - TS = U + PV - TS
    static Real
    heatCapacity(Real dEnergyDT)
    Heat capacity: C = ∂/∂T
    static Real
    helmholtzFreeEnergy(Real internalEnergy, Real temperature, Real entropy)
    Helmholtz free energy: F = U - TS
    static Real
    maxwellBoltzmannSpeed(Real speed, Real mass, Real temperature)
    Maxwell-Boltzmann speed distribution: f(v) = 4π(m/2πkT)^(3/2) v² e^(-mv²/2kT)
    static Real
    partitionFunction(Real[] energies, Real temperature)
    Partition function (canonical ensemble): Z = Σᵢ e^(-Eᵢ/kT)

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • boltzmannProbability

      public static Real boltzmannProbability(Real energy, Real temperature, Real partitionFunction)
      Boltzmann distribution: P(E) = e^(-E/kT) / Z Returns probability of state with energy E

    • partitionFunction

      public static Real partitionFunction(Real[] energies, Real temperature)
      Partition function (canonical ensemble): Z = Σᵢ e^(-Eᵢ/kT)

    • boltzmannEntropy

      public static Real boltzmannEntropy(Real numMicrostates)
      Boltzmann entropy: S = k ln(Ω) where Ω is number of microstates

    • maxwellBoltzmannSpeed

      public static Real maxwellBoltzmannSpeed(Real speed, Real mass, Real temperature)
      Maxwell-Boltzmann speed distribution: f(v) = 4π(m/2πkT)^(3/2) v² e^(-mv²/2kT)

    • averageEnergy

      public static Real averageEnergy(Real partitionFunction, Real temperature, Real dZdT)
      Average energy from partition function: = -∂ln(Z)/∂β where β = 1/kT

    • heatCapacity

      public static Real heatCapacity(Real dEnergyDT)
      Heat capacity: C = ∂/∂T

    • fermiDiracDistribution

      public static Real fermiDiracDistribution(Real energy, Real chemicalPotential, Real temperature)
      Fermi-Dirac distribution: f(E) = 1/(e^((E-μ)/kT) + 1) For fermions (electrons, etc.)

    • boseEinsteinDistribution

      public static Real boseEinsteinDistribution(Real energy, Real chemicalPotential, Real temperature)
      Bose-Einstein distribution: f(E) = 1/(e^((E-μ)/kT) - 1) For bosons (photons, etc.)

    • gibbsFreeEnergy

      public static Real gibbsFreeEnergy(Real enthalpy, Real temperature, Real entropy)
      Gibbs free energy: G = H - TS = U + PV - TS
